post.title: We Need Air Show Volunteers!

post.content:
We need Air Show volunteers all days!

This is one of our largest fundraisers!

We are in need of the following volunteers:

  • Saturday --- 36 spots open
  • Sunday --- 50 spots open
  • Monday -- 64 spots open

Bring your family, friends, and relatives! Volunteer and see the Air Show!

Sign up and spend the day at the Air Show AND raise money for the band! It is a fun day of selling tickets, passing out programs or parking cars. Plenty of breaks and lunch provided. Bring a chair and watch the show!

Here is the link to our signup form.

Contact: Gary Diehl 440-915-1178
